tiles.name: No. of Accounts vs Verified Accounts

tiles.markdown:
# POD Dashboards
***

## 1. Authentication  

* [RP Monitoring](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-6h;gf=all;id=7ebbeb31-abe0-4dc7-a07b-46ea127c65fd)

* [Auth](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-2h;gf=all;id=c31ecb67-5343-40be-b889-fb0ecc42ac1b)  

## 2. Account management

* [IPV Core - Account Management SLAs](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=2d26bc66-2b87-4bd6-88d7-be7b0090dc0c)

* [Orange - Account Management SLAs](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.dashboards/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=d78a7039-19e8-4dd7-9287-02c3b4b7c564)

* [Orange Address CRI Lambda Metrics](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=a5753662-098e-4658-b25b-925f5b3c49e0)
* [Orange KBV CRI Lambda Metrics](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=ea9366a9-6185-45ea-b98a-449bc2c4ccb6)
* [Orange Check HMRC CRI Lambda-Metrics](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=c4ad4683-127c-4d4c-82ed-46b911fd1293)
* [Orange Check HMRC Step 
Functions](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=90bfa4e8-9cbf-4243-b0ab-7d7f89770fd7)
* [Orange Address CRI](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.dashboards/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=1dfeb615-f2dd-43e8-9897-9c58e6c64617)
* [Orange KBV CRI](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.dashboards/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=035a1649-fbcb-40cb-a690-a97038174b76)


## 3. Identity proving

* [Kiwi](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=2024-07-01T10:51:00+01:00%20to%202024-07-31T10:51:00+01:00;gf=all;id=9249c97d-8dd6-4f43-b292-7ad70232f6c7)

* [Mobile](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;id=f2c3f69d-5972-47e4-9d1e-7f9feb8e53ca;gtf=-2h;gf=all)

* [Spot Monitoring](https://gds.splunkcloud.com/en-GB/app/gds-050-digital-Identity/wip_spot__overview?form.time_token.earliest=%40d&form.time_token.latest=now&form.env=production&form.stack=*&form.interval=1h)
* [SPOT Lambda Dashboard](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.dashboards/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=21b031fb-c8bb-4d6b-8bd7-347aa77e04c2)
* [CIMIT API Gateway Metrics](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.dashboards/#dashboard;gtf=-2h;gf=all;id=95cb6167-f510-445f-95ee-624d0bb93608)
* [SPOT data-vocab](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.dashboards/#dashboard;gtf=-2h;gf=all;id=a7fbfa14-15fb-4dfa-b02a-2c281ac0212f)
* [CIMIT Healthcheck](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.dashboards/dashboard/176d43a5-911e-437c-931d-a0f1054403d2#from=2024-06-30T23%3A00%3A00.000Z&to=2024-07-31T22%3A59%3A00.000Z)
* [SPOT Healthcheck](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.dashboards/dashboard/7031abbc-662f-4dab-ab6d-9d31f4a03536#from=2024-06-30T23%3A00%3A00.000Z&to=2024-07-31T22%3A59%3A00.000Z)

## 4. Data

* [Data/TxMA](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.dashboards/#dashboard;gtf=-30m;gf=all;id=53eb1e66-e7db-48e2-a45e-00f70573802f)


## 5. KiWI - BAV

* [KIWI - BAV](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.dashboards/#dashboard;gtf=-24h%20to%20now;gf=all;id=dd09eb1f-6e28-42ac-bbf7-82ae57ce5710)

## 6. Check HMRC

* [Orange Check HMRC CRI](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-24h%20to%20now;gf=all;id=867bc68b-6e1a-4565-97be-3747f3174d1d)
* [Orange Check HMRC CRI Lambda-Metrics](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-7d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=c4ad4683-127c-4d4c-82ed-46b911fd1293)
* [Orange Check HMRC step functions](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=90bfa4e8-9cbf-4243-b0ab-7d7f89770fd7)


## 7. Orange OTG
* [Orange OTG CRI Lambda Metrics](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=ee6f39ba-fdbc-4310-b299-938f3896df49)
* [Orange OTG step functions](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=12cbe9c5-c7c3-4228-938c-e28d5a216e14)
* [Orange OTG CRI](https://bhe21058.live.dynatrace.com/#dashboard;gtf=-30d%20to%20now;gf=all;id=80b13498-558b-45a0-8212-0e1553d00ae6;applyDashboardDefaults=true)


## 8. Reference

* [Confluence - TSD Overview Dashboard Playbook](https://govukverify.atlassian.net/l/cp/x5vh02dY)
* [Service page](https://bhe21058.apps.dynatrace.com/ui/apps/dynatrace.classic.services/ui/services?gtf=-6h&gf=all&sorting=name%3Basc)

thresholds.columnId: LambdaFunction rate of failed invocations to all invocations %

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
# Additional Information

- Supporting TxMA is available in the [team manual](https://team-manual.account.gov.uk/teams/txma-team/)
- All dashboard where relevant will have thresholds from green, yellow and red
- The CSLS queues will have events in their queue as its part of tech debt to fix those queues
- the queues `self-production-EC-SQS*` are filled up with messages as expected.
- To get in touch with the TxMA team, visit **#di-ask-txma** in Slack

tiles.name: F2F Requests/Errors
metricExpressions: resolution=null&(ext:cloud.aws.apiGateway.countSum:filter(and(or(in("dt.entity.custom_device",entitySelector("type(custom_device),entityName.equals(~"f2f-cri-api - F2F Credential Issuer Private API~")"))))):splitBy():sort(value(auto,descending)):limit(20)):limit(100):names,(ext:cloud.aws.apiGateway."5xxErrorSum":filter(and(or(in("dt.entity.custom_device",entitySelector("type(custom_device),entityName.equals(~"f2f-cri-api - F2F Credential Issuer Private API~")"))))):splitBy():sort(value(auto,descending)):limit(20)):limit(100):names,(cloud.aws.apigateway.countByAccountIdApiIdRegion:filter(and(eq("aws.account.id","377086294028"),eq(apiid,"8odghv7ewk"))):splitBy():sum:sort(value(sum,descending))):limit(100):names,(cloud.aws.apigateway."5xxByAccountIdApiIdRegion":filter(and(eq("aws.account.id","377086294028"),eq(apiid,"8odghv7ewk"))):splitBy():sum:sort(value(sum,descending))):limit(100):names,(ext:cloud.aws.apiGateway."4xxErrorSum":filter(and(or(in("dt.entity.custom_device",entitySelector("type(custom_device),entityName.equals(~"f2f-cri-api - F2F Credential Issuer Private API~")"))))):splitBy():sort(value(auto,descending)):limit(20)):limit(100):names,(cloud.aws.apigateway."4xxByAccountIdApiIdRegion":filter(and(eq("aws.account.id","377086294028"),eq(apiid,"8odghv7ewk"))):splitBy():sum:sort(value(sum,descending))):limit(100):names

tiles.name: F2F Requests Latency
metricExpressions: resolution=null&(ext:cloud.aws.apiGateway.latency:filter(and(or(in("dt.entity.custom_device",entitySelector("type(custom_device),entityName.equals(~"f2f-cri-api - F2F Credential Issuer Private API~")"))))):splitBy():max:sort(value(max,descending)):limit(20)):limit(100):names,(ext:cloud.aws.apiGateway.latency:filter(and(or(in("dt.entity.custom_device",entitySelector("type(custom_device),entityName.equals(~"f2f-cri-api - F2F Credential Issuer Private API~")"))))):splitBy():min:sort(value(min,descending)):limit(20)):limit(100):names,(ext:cloud.aws.apiGateway.latency:filter(and(or(in("dt.entity.custom_device",entitySelector("type(custom_device),entityName.equals(~"f2f-cri-api - F2F Credential Issuer Private API~")"))))):splitBy():avg:sort(value(avg,descending)):limit(20)):limit(100):names,(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiIdRegion:filter(and(eq("aws.account.id","377086294028"),eq(apiid,"8odghv7ewk"))):splitBy():max:sort(value(max,descending))):limit(100):names,(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiIdRegion:filter(and(eq("aws.account.id","377086294028"),eq(apiid,"8odghv7ewk"))):splitBy():min:sort(value(min,descending))):limit(100):names,(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiIdRegion:filter(and(eq("aws.account.id","377086294028"),eq(apiid,"8odghv7ewk"))):splitBy():avg:sort(value(avg,descending))):limit(100):names

tiles.name: Backend Requests/4XX/5XX BAV
metricExpressions: resolution=null&(cloud.aws.apigateway.countByAccountIdApiNameRegion:filter(and(or(eq(apiname,"bav-cri-api - BAV Credential Issuer Private API")),or(eq("aws.region",eu-west-2)),or(ne("aws.account.id","576724867321")))):splitBy("aws.account.id"):sum:names:sort(dimension("aws.account.id",ascending)):limit(20)):limit(100):names,(cloud.aws.apigateway."4xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameMethodRegionResourceStage":filter(and(or(eq(apiname,"bav-cri-api - BAV Credential Issuer Private API")),or(ne("aws.account.id","576724867321")))):splitBy("aws.account.id",apiname):sum:sort(dimension("aws.account.id",ascending)):limit(20)):limit(100):names,(cloud.aws.apigateway."5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameMethodRegionResourceStage":filter(and(or(eq(apiname,"bav-cri-api - BAV Credential Issuer Private API")),or(ne("aws.account.id","576724867321")))):splitBy("aws.account.id",apiname):sum:sort(dimension("aws.account.id",ascending)):limit(20)):limit(100):names

tiles.name: Production Changes in the Last 3 Days
Markdown
tiles.markdown:
# Using the Production Change Dashboard


Changes can sometimes result incidents. This dashboard shows production changes, and are a resource to be able to identify incidents which have potentially been caused by a production change. 

## Suggested use is:


When an issue comes up, for example with di-auth, check the times that the issue occurred against when any changes were deployed, or if there was a failed deployment of di-auth. If so, raise it with the pod, and explain the issue, and explore whether their change was potentially the culprit. If so, they should be able to roll it back. If not, proceed to other forms of troubleshooting.
